title: Education Explorer Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Thanksgiving Point
Interview Descriptions: After being invited in for an interview, I sat in a large conference room with two other women who were conducting the interview. They were both very friendly and we chatted a before and in between questions.
Interview Questions: What does the word "inquiry" mean to you?

title: Sales Associate Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Thanksgiving Point (Lehi, UT)
Interview Descriptions: really weird interview. had about three persons interviewing me, including the head manager and two co-managers. first, had me wait around 20 minutes while they made another sales associate watch me and "analyze" how I acted. then, they took me outside, asked me some basic questions, and then started talking about weird books for about 20 minutes, mostly with eachother. then they let me go and said a job offer would be extended to me within a week. overall really weird place.
Interview Questions: If you could be any MALE Disney character, who would you be? (this was weird because I'm female)

title: Part Time Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Thanksgiving Point (Lehi, UT) in Aug 2014
Interview Descriptions: There were two parts. First I met with the head of HR. Then I met with the head of department with the job vacancy. They had similar questions, although the meeting with the head of the department asked questions that were a bit more specific to the job. I think they may be doing a panel of the two now though.
Interview Questions: What would you do if you saw a coworker stealing product?

title: Banquet Server Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 5 days. I interviewed at Thanksgiving Point (Lehi, UT) in May 2013
Interview Descriptions: Applied online, shortly after called and invited to a one on one interview. It was the shortest interview I've been to. They just wanted to make sure I seemed like a reliable and responsible worker. Interviewer was the Banquet Manager at the time and she was very friendly and easy going. It was a very relaxed interview, but you should still dress nice, of course.
Interview Questions: If i had previous experience working events.

title: Golf Cart Runner Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Thanksgiving Point (Lehi, UT) in Jun 2011
Interview Descriptions: I was called in for an interview and the interview question about customer service and emphasized quality of business. I was given an offer in the interview and accepted the offer. I should have worn slacks and a golf polo to the interview. I suggest not over dressing. Two experienced supervisors interviewed me.
